Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -3,14 +3,14 @@
 
 # Set the working directory inside the container
 WORKDIR /app
 
+# Install Hex and Rebar
+RUN mix local.hex --force && mix local.rebar --force
+
 # Copy the mix.exs and mix.lock files to the working directory
 COPY mix.exs mix.lock ./
 
-# Install Hex and Rebar
-RUN mix local.hex --force && mix local.rebar --force
-
 # Install the Elixir dependencies
 RUN mix deps.get
 
 # Copy the rest of the application code to the working directory
@@ -18,6 +18,6 @@
 
 # Compile the Elixir project
 RUN mix compile
 
-# Set the default command to run your Elixir application
-CMD ["mix", "run", "--no-halt"]
\ No newline at end of file
+# Set the default command to start IEx with Mix
+CMD ["iex", "-S", "mix"]
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,6 +1,19 @@
 FROM elixir:1.17.1
 WORKDIR /app
+RUN apk --update add --no-cache openssh bash \
+  && sed -i s/#PermitRootLogin.*/PermitRootLogin\ yes/ /etc/ssh/sshd_config \
+  && echo "root:root" | chpasswd \
+  && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*
+RUN sed -ie 's/#Port 22/Port 22/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
+RUN sed -ri 's/#HostKey \/etc\/ssh\/ssh_host_key/HostKey \/etc\/ssh\/ssh_host_key/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
+RUN sed -ir 's/#HostKey \/etc\/ssh\/ssh_host_rsa_key/HostKey \/etc\/ssh\/ssh_host_rsa_key/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
+RUN sed -ir 's/#HostKey \/etc\/ssh\/ssh_host_dsa_key/HostKey \/etc\/ssh\/ssh_host_dsa_key/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
+RUN sed -ir 's/#HostKey \/etc\/ssh\/ssh_host_ecdsa_key/HostKey \/etc\/ssh\/ssh_host_ecdsa_key/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
+RUN sed -ir 's/#HostKey \/etc\/ssh\/ssh_host_ed25519_key/HostKey \/etc\/ssh\/ssh_host_ed25519_key/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
+RUN sed -ie 's/AllowTcpForwarding no/AllowTcpForwarding yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
+RUN /usr/bin/ssh-keygen -A
+RUN ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -f  /etc/ssh/ssh_host_key
 RUN mix local.hex --force && mix local.rebar --force
 COPY mix.exs mix.lock ./
 RUN mix deps.get
 COPY . .

+FROM elixir:1.17.2

   && sed -i s/#PermitRootLogin.*/PermitRootLogin\ yes/ /etc/ssh/sshd_config \
   && echo "root:root" | chpasswd \
   && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*

-RUN ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -f  /etc/ssh/ssh_host_key
+RUN ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -f /etc/ssh/ssh_host_key
 RUN mix local.hex --force && mix local.rebar --force

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
# Use the official Elixir image from the Docker Hub
FROM elixir:1.12

# Set the working directory inside the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the mix.exs and mix.lock files to the working directory
COPY mix.exs mix.lock ./

# Install Hex and Rebar
RUN mix local.hex --force && mix local.rebar --force

# Install the Elixir dependencies
RUN mix deps.get

# Copy the rest of the application code to the working directory
COPY . .

# Compile the Elixir project
RUN mix compile

# Set the default command to run your Elixir application
CMD ["mix", "run", "--no-halt"]
